title: Region changes fml....
body: So my account is actually in NA, but I'm going to EUW for a few weeks...Now that i arrived in France I wanna swap my account to EUW but when i tried to log into the game, even though "logging in" appeared it lasted too mauch and actually showed the "conncection error" notification. fml....how can i swap my account to EUW now that i cant login into the client? Is there any way???{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{summoner:3}}

replies.body: Depending on your current network situation, you might be having connection problems reaching the authentication servers.  I recommend using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help strengthen up your network and restore that connection.  This sounds more of a connection issue, and not necessarily trying to connect from your physical location.  Hope that helps!
Im in a hotel ... so yes is that thank you :D
